table.name: vtiger_announcements
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_announcements` ( `announcementsid` int NOT NULL, `annos_file` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `annos_active` int DEFAULT NULL, `announcements_no` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`announcementsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3

table.name: vtiger_announcementscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_announcementscf` ( `announcementsid` int NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`announcementsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3

table.name: vtiger_announcement
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_announcement` ( `announcementid` int NOT NULL, `anno_file` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `anno_active` int DEFAULT NULL, `announcement_no` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `tags` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`announcementid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3

table.name: vtiger_announcementcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_announcementcf` ( `announcementid` int NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`announcementid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3
